DOC.brief_summary: Exercise intervention for men with prostate cancer on androgen deprivation therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Supervised Group Based Exercise for Men With Prostate Cancer on Androgen Deprivation Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the project is to investigate the effects of patient education and exercise intervention implemented in daily clinical practice for men with prostate cancer on androgen deprivation therapy - Functional capacity - Quality of life - Body composition - Blood pressure and to assess safety of progressive resistance training for participants with bone metastases.
DOC.criteria: Patients with a prostate cancer diagnosis on androgen deprivation therapy Opioid demanding treatment for skeletal pain Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status > 2 Inability to perform floor and machine exercises independently
